item.description: The homeowner said she told the salesman she was not interested and to leave multiple times.

item.title: Bradenton couple celebrating living after rescue from Israel
item.description: The couple said they never expected a volunteer mission would turn into a rescue.

item.title: Flood watch over as system moves into Gulf
item.description: Thankfully the tropical disturbance, Invest 93L moved across N. Florida keeping the storm production down for our area.

item.title: Lehigh Acres man ties up his friend and uses his credit cards, deputies allege
item.description: The victim told deputies the friend used a machete to choke him into unconsciousness.

item.title: Three boys arrested in connection with Riverwalk boat fire
item.description: The Bradenton Police Department said reports of a fire next to Green Bridge were received around 1:30 p.m. on Monday

item.title: Affordable housing in Sarasota becoming more scarce as rent costs increase
item.description: The need for affordable housing in Sarasota is becoming an ever-increasing topic of concern.

item.title: Florida executes man for killing 2 outside a bar, the 26th U.S. execution this year
item.description: Bell is the eighth person executed in Florida this year, with a ninth scheduled for later this month.

item.title: Coast Guard shuts down illegal charter operation near Madeira Beach
item.description: The 50-foot boat had 40 passengers on board, the Coast Guard said.
